title: #51 - Game Theory's MatPat Convinces CouRage & Nadeshot to Leave Los Angeles
itunes:title: #51 - MatPat Convinces CouRage & Nadeshot to Leave Los Angeles
description: MatPat of YouTube's most popular theory channels, The Game Theorists, The Film Theorists, The Food Theorists, and more comes onto the show for a new episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show. Starting with his controversial interview with the CEO of YouTube, MatPat goes on to explain the different generations of YouTube from early comedy channels like Smosh to the Viner explosion, the origins of Game Theory and how he's adjusting his content to the quarantine, as well as life as a parent.
